title: Garfield Eats Crow
description: The perfect holiday gift for fans of the witty kitty!Mischief's on the menu and trouble's brewin' in this concoction of comics. Share in the shenanigans, as Garfield, the furry prankster, engages in a little "tomcatfoolery" that's sure to elicit some catty laughter.
author: Jim Davis
